name: nayrojas-mdlinks
description: [Markdown](https://medium.com/@itsjzt/beginner-guide-to-markdown-229adce30074) es un lenguaje de marcado ligero muy popular entre developers. Markdown is made by John Gruber, you can use markdown to write blogs, texts, books and practically 100% of your writing work in a single format and you can easily distribute it in Word, PDFs, EPUBs, HTML, and many other formats.
author: nayrojas
